attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The last teenager to have been killed in the City of London for no reason is Jimmy Mizen. He is the thirteenth teenager to be killed by thugs that belong to our society. We must send out the strong message to all teenagers of London that life sentence means life sentence. By this I mean that whoever commits a serious crime should be locked in for the rest of their life.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
